DOC.brief_summary: Purpose/Objective study : The main objective study investigate oral health awareness attitude towards oral health among Norwegian pregnant woman assess impact information oral hygiene risk dental caries pregnancy . The hypothesis study : 1 . The state oral health pregnancy depend pregnant woman 's preventive oral hygiene behaviour practice . 2 . Pregnant woman high level oral health awareness positive attitude towards oral health likely visit dentists regularly well oral hygiene compare less awareness . 3 . Proper information guidance oral hygiene care provide pregnancy help improve oral bacteriological milieu reduce dental caries risk among pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Self Reported Oral Health , Awareness Attitude Towards Dental Care Among Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: Women viable pregnancy â‰¥ 17 week gestation Those willing participate study . Women unable communicate well Norwegian . Women diagnose fetus chromosomal structural fetal anomaly plan continue pregnancy
DOC.keyword: pregnancy , oral health , attitude , awareness , streptococcus mutans , lactobacillus
